p: Ten grams of powdered sample was weighed and mixed with 100 ml of distilled water in a conical flask, covered with aluminum foil. Then kept at 37 °C in a shaker incubator at 120 rpm for 24 h. Using an autoclaved Whatman No.1 filter paper, the filtrate was collected slowly in a conical flask and then stored inside autoclaved falcon tubes at 4 °C in the refrigerator.
